sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense>0</defense> <description>Many ancient Jedi Knights favored heavy concealing robes for their anonymity, and now Force users throughout the galaxy use them to avoid notice. While they can be made in a variety of styles from nearly any material, all concealing robes are many-layered, floor-length garments with deep hoods which can easily obscure an individual's shape and hide his face in shadow and folds of cloth.  Thanks to their cut and construction, concealing robes add 1 setback die to checks to notice or recognize an individual wearing them.  Models Include: Various cuts and combinations.</description> <encumbrance>1</encumbrance> <hard_points>0</hard_points> <hp_required/> <name>Concealing Robes</name> <number>GEAR0001043</number> <price>150</price> <range/> <rarity>2</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak>1</soak> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 16:42:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>9e8d7a202f90a450e0f497eef699b696</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 16:42:23</sys_updated_on> <type>armor</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
